statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 22 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 8 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + x + 4 , -2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , -8 \, x^{3} + 16 \, x^{2} - 14 \, x + 4 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
